articles.title: Calgary police seeking millions in additional funding, citing budget gap
articles.description: Calgary police are asking city council for millions in additional funding, citing a $49.4 million gap in their budget caused by declining photo radar revenue and the pressures of a growing population. articles.description: All westbound lanes of the Gardiner Expressway have reopened at Yonge Street after a two-vehicle collision. The collision occurred after 8 p.m. near Lower Jarvis Street.
